news.title: JPMorgan Chase tops estimates as trading revenue hits a record of nearly $9 billion
news.summary: CEO Jamie Dimon said that while each of his major business lines performed well against a good economic backdrop, he was preparing for possible turbulence.

news.title: China targets five U.S. subsidiaries of South Korea's Hanwha Ocean, sending shares down 8%
news.summary: The order took effect immediately. It will prohibit Chinese organizations and individuals from doing business with the sanctioned companies. The order, which took effect immediate, will prohibit China from doingbusiness with the companies.

news.title: Disney has considered a co-CEO structure to replace Bob Iger. Its history may make that a bad idea
news.summary: . Spotify and Comcast have recently installed co-CEO structures. Disney's corporate culture and history of botched successions may make that less likely.

news.title: How China's rare earth restrictions could disrupt the U.S. defense industry and reignite a trade war
news.summary: China will not allow the export of rare earth materials for use by foreign militaries under restrictions announced last week. China will not allowed the export. of rare Earth materials forUse by foreign military.

news.title: Goldman Sachs beats estimates on better-than-expected investment banking, bond trading
news.summary: Goldman Sachs gets the majority of its revenue from Wall Street activities including trading and investment banking. Goldman Sachs is one of the world's largest investment banks.

news.title: Why your stock and bond index funds outsmart Wall Street’s best and brightest

news.title: U.S. economy still vulnerable to tariff shocks, IMF says, and labor shortages tied to immigration crackdown could also sting
news.summary: U.S. economy hasn't suffered much so far from big increases in tariffs or a decline in the labor supply due to tighter immigration rules. But that might change.

news.title: ‘I’d hate to turn her over to the state’: My mother, who has dementia, refuses to be put in a facility. What can we do?
news.summary: “She has never been willing to sign a power of attorney,” her attorney says. “She’s never been able to get her way.”

news.title: ‘We’re in a market bubble based on AI exuberance’: I’m moving my $200K IRA to a money-market account. Is that wise?
news.summary: “I will also draw Social Security when I reach 70, which will be $3,500 per month,” he says.

news.title: GM will take a $1.6 billion hit as it predicts a drop in EV demand. Here’s the latest setback.
news.summary: The end of a critical tax credit will force the company to scale back its plans for EV investments. GM’s stock is falling as the result.
